biotools.summary: An interactive 1D NMR spectra processing tool dedicated to metabolomics. This open source software provides a complete set of tools for processing and visualization of 1D NMR data, the whole within an interactive interface based on a spectra visualization.

bioschemas.name: NMRProcFlow
